name: Vs Cursed Annie
description:
First trailer: 

The reason why i haven't made better sprites yet is because i'm not good at drawing and i am working on this all by mysekf and i like the charm of the rat dog lookin thing.

The reason why i made this mod is because a friend of mine hates this creature so i figured that this would be a funny thing to do, i do not mean to mock Atsuovers art, music or anything i just meant to do this as a joke for my friend and i just wanted to make it clear that i'm not mocking her art or music.

The original person who made the image and the songs is Atusover.

Atsuovers youtube

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZdjLc8Q9Hst6p3Ofb__3Q

The engines i'm using is kade engine & forever engine
